definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
Huaxi Village in Jiangsu Province 江蘇省|江苏省[Jiang1 su1 Sheng3]

sentences.english: The village now attracts businesses interested in shipping, steel, tobacco and textiles.
sentences.chinese: 現在華西村開始開發船運，鋼鐵，菸草和紡織業。

sentences.english: The village is no stranger to curious projects either.
sentences.chinese: 在華西村，各種奇奇怪怪的工程也不少見。

sentences.english: The party secretary says he wants to turn the "city village" of Huaxi into a Shangri-la.
sentences.chinese: 他表示自己想把華西村建設成香格里拉。

sentences.english: Nicole Kidman is renting out her "extraordinary, high-floor residence" in New York's West Village.
sentences.chinese: 妮可基德曼證出租她在紐約西村不同凡響的高層住宅。

sentences.english: It worked so well that Huaxi has become the richest village in China.
sentences.chinese: 現在華西村已經變成中國最富裕的村莊了。

sentences.english: Her findings suggest the body has another way to protect itself, Nishimura said.
sentences.chinese: 西村說，她的這項發現提出身體另有方法保護自己。

sentences.english: Until recently, Huaxi was a poor farming community, typical of eastern China.
sentences.chinese: 從前，華西村不過是個典型的華東貧困村莊。

sentences.english: Still, "since the dollar is staying below 86 yen, there still is tension in the market," said Yumi Nishimura, senior market analyst at Daiwa Securities Capital Markets.
sentences.chinese: 大和證券資本市場首席市場分析師西村由美說。

sentences.english: She was born in Yunzhouxi village, in the Wenshui County of the Shanxi province.
sentences.chinese: 她出生於陝西省文水縣雲周西村。

sentences.english: It was the first time Xichunyiming had visited Hefei. He said Hefei had left a good impression on him.
sentences.chinese: 西村義明首次來肥，他說合肥給他留下了很好的印象。

sentences.english: New houses stand in Huaxi village, China's richest village in Jiangsu province.
sentences.chinese: 中國最富裕的村莊華西村，新民居鱗次櫛比。

sentences.english: Until recently, Huaxi was a poor farming community in Jiangsu province.
sentences.chinese: 不久之前，華西村還只是江蘇省一個貧困的農業村。

sentences.english: Huaxi Village, located east of the city of Jiangyin, in Jiangsu province, claims to be the richest village in China.
sentences.chinese: 華西村位於江蘇省江陰市東部，是中國最富裕的村莊。

sentences.english: And then I go to the East River to go running, and I work in the West Village.
sentences.chinese: 然後我去東河跑步，在西村工作。

sentences.english: Nishimura is planning other experiments to investigate these possibilities, she said.
sentences.chinese: 西村說，她正在計劃進行其他實驗以研究這些可能性。

sentences.english: Xicun Maoshu's kind citizen moral and education.
sentences.chinese: 西村茂樹的善良的國民道德和教育思想。

definition: Macun district of Jiaozuo city 焦作市[Jiao1 zuo4 shi4], Henan
Dacun township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
Tung Tau Tseun village, Hong Kong Island
Xinzhuang or Hsinchuang city in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
Mengcun Hui autonomous county in Cangzhou 滄州|沧州[Cang1 zhou1], Hebei
township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan
Liujia village in Zhangdian district 张店区 of Zhibo city 淄博市[Zi1 bo2 shi4], Shandong
